changeRegistry(address).details: This function is used to change the registry address in case of an upgrade.

params.registryAddress: The address of the upgraded Registry contract.

params.fundingNFT_: The ERC1155 token contract which will represent the lending amounts.
params.lendingToken_: The token that lenders will be able to lend.
params.mainNFT_: The ERC721 token contract which will represent the whole loans.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

transferCollateralToken(address,address,.details: This function is used to send the collateral amount to the seeker.

params.amount: The amount of collateral tokens to be sent to seeker.
params.recipient: The address to transfer the collateral tokens to.

transferFundingNFT(uint256,uint256,addre.details: This function is used to send the ERC1155 tokens from escrow to the lenders.

params.partitionsPurchased: The amount of ERC1155 tokens that should be sent back to the lender.

transferLendingToken(address,uint256).details: This function is used to send the lended amount to the seeker.

params.amount: The amount of lending tokens to be sent to seeker.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

userdoc.notice: Responsible for handling the funds in AllianceBlock's ecosystem.
